page.title: 19JOBS IN DIPTFORD
page.content: For centuries the people of Diptford have been associated with the land. Working on the{land}was the only employment. Time and mechanisation have changed that and now people have had to find jobs away from Diptford. This has meant using the car to go to the major towns in the area to work in factories, offices, shops, and construction work. The population of Diptford is now{mobile}and this mobility has meant a change in the range of labour available. There is now a large percentage of{professional people who are intergrated with the local inhabitants. Finding work is still a problem as the unemployment rate is very high.
